law.text: The sum appropriated by the General Assembly for premiums alone shall be paid to the State Fair Board and be disbursed by its agent as a petty cash fund in accordance with the provisions of KRS 45A.650.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 58, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 219. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 30, sec. 1. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618i-11.
